content: Great article and conversation starter. However… The Google Books moonshot was making the world’s books full-text searchable. 13yrs later, Google has indexed the complete contents of tens of millions of books and made them full text searchable by anyone in the world in blink of an eye. That’s what a flag on the moon looks like. More reaction to the piece including some places I think it went wrong at: https://twitter.com/amac/status/852173702833864704
